channel.title: Project Oracle |317|Stable|Eco|Korasi|Updates|Many Online|VPS
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/2s9vr6ojpg.gif[/img]
• [url=http://www.oracle-scape.com/index.php] Forums [/url] • [url=http://www.oracle-scape.com/play.php] Play Now [/url]
We have 10+ active players on daily in our second day of release!
The server is currently 24/7 Vps hosted, lag free.
There might not be alot of pictures, but I promise you will not be disappointed for giving this server a try.
Please post nice comments or don't post at all. That really aggravates me.
Features • Dragon Claws (with four specs) • Anti Dupe • Lag Free • Vps Hosted • Many Online Daily • Summoning • Dungeoneering soon to come • All skills working • Easy Xp for training • Korasi • SMF Forum (VBulletin soon to come) • Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wilderness. • GWD is the same as Runescape! All 4 bosses fully working. • Perfect clipped following/walking for players. • Perfect clipped following for NPCs. • Unique home at Edgeville. • Many bosses, such as Corp, Strykewyrms, Bork, etc. • Most bugs are fixed. • Max cape with fully working emote! • Curses with correct aminations like RS. • Perfect switching.
Skills • Fully working thieving, stalls gives a good amount of cash. • Fully working crafting, with interfaces. • Fully working summoning, with specials. • Fully working farming, like RS. • Fully working firemaking, red fire and clipping like RS. • Fully working hunter, gives imp jars for every catch. • Fully working fishing/cooking, different zone. (not catherby) • Fully working mining/smithing, mine ores then smith it into bars to make armours! • Fully working agility, with many courses to train from. • Fully working woodcutting, axe swinging like RS. • Fully working herblore, you can make extremes and overloads! • Fully working fletching, making shortbows, longbows, and arrows. • Perfect slayer/slayer tasks. Low levels gets noob tasks, higher levels gets elite tasks. You can also earn OS points with slayer!
Minigames • Pest Control gives OS points to spend on our awesome shop. • Duel Arena staking fully working, dupe free. • Barrows gives a good chance of a barrow drop. • One wave for the might Jad, gives fire cape and the new fire cape as well! • Warrior's Guild, get your dragon defender here. • Fight caves fully working! With rewards. [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_13.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_6-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/11195_17191png-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_23.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_17.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_22.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_21.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i949.photobucket.com/albums/ad339/humon9/Screenshot_19.png[/img]

item.title: Project Oracle |317|Stable|Eco|Korasi|Updates|Many Online|VPS
item.dc:creator: @MrPotato MrPotato
item.description:
@MrPotato wrote:

• Forums
• Play Now

We have 10+ active players on daily in our second day of release!

The server is currently 24/7 Vps hosted, lag free.

There might not be alot of pictures, but I promise you will not be disappointed for giving this server a try.

Please post nice comments or don’t post at all. That really aggravates me.

Features
• Dragon Claws (with four specs)
• Anti Dupe
• Lag Free
• Vps Hosted
• Many Online Daily
• Summoning
• Dungeoneering soon to come
• All skills working
• Easy Xp for training
• Korasi
• SMF Forum (VBulletin soon to come)
• Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wilderness.
• GWD is the same as Runescape! All 4 bosses fully working.
• Perfect clipped following/walking for players.
• Perfect clipped following for NPCs.
• Unique home at Edgeville.
• Many bosses, such as Corp, Strykewyrms, Bork, etc.
• Most bugs are fixed.
• Max cape with fully working emote!
• Curses with correct aminations like RS.
• Perfect switching.

Skills
• Fully working thieving, stalls gives a good amount of cash.
• Fully working crafting, with interfaces.
• Fully working summoning, with specials.
• Fully working farming, like RS.
• Fully working firemaking, red fire and clipping like RS.
• Fully working hunter, gives imp jars for every catch.
• Fully working fishing/cooking, different zone. (not catherby)
• Fully working mining/smithing, mine ores then smith it into bars to make armours!
• Fully working agility, with many courses to train from.
• Fully working woodcutting, axe swinging like RS.
• Fully working herblore, you can make extremes and overloads!
• Fully working fletching, making shortbows, longbows, and arrows.
• Perfect slayer/slayer tasks. Low levels gets noob tasks, higher levels gets elite tasks. You can also earn OS points with slayer!

Minigames
• Pest Control gives OS points to spend on our awesome shop.
• Duel Arena staking fully working, dupe free.
• Barrows gives a good chance of a barrow drop.
• One wave for the might Jad, gives fire cape and the new fire cape as well!
• Warrior’s Guild, get your dragon defender here.
• Fight caves fully working! With rewards.
